Bluetooth permissions allow Zemzeme to discover and communicate with other users nearby through a mesh network. This enables fully offline, peer-to-peer messaging without any internet connection.
Android requires location permission to scan for Bluetooth devices nearby. Zemzeme does NOT track or store your location.
Background location allows Zemzeme to discover nearby users even when the app is in the background. Without this, the mesh network only works while the app is open on screen.
Notifications let you know when you receive a private message or when new activity happens in your channels, even when the app is in the background.
